channel.title: Softlayer_scale_member on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_scale_member on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Member
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Member Service Datatype Description The base member of a scale group. Members are the volatile scaling units of a scale group. This cannot be used by itself, one of the more specific member types and services must be used. Methods deleteObject Delete this group member. This is not the recommended way to delete members. Instead, users should use invocations on the group itself to do scaling.

item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Member
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Member Datatype Description Local createDate When this member was created. Type: dateTime id A member's internal identifier. Type: integer scaleGroupId The identifier of the group this member belongs to. Type: integer Relational scaleGroup The group this member belongs to. Type: SoftLayer_Scale_Group Relational
